SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MALL.MALL_TB_POINTS_CARD C, (SELECT t.USER_ID, t.USER_NAME FROM MALL.MALL_TB_USER t WHERE t.STATE = 'U' ) U WHERE C.USER_ID = U.USER_ID(+) AND C.STATE = 'U' AND C.SHOP_ID = #shopId#
u.user_name like #userName,handler=wildcard#
c.CARD_NO like #cardNo,handler=wildcard#
c.IS_USED = #isUsed#

SELECT C.ID, C.POINTS, C.CARD_NO AS cardNo, c.PASSWORD, TO_CHAR(C.EXPIRE_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS expireDate, U.USER_NAME AS userName, C.IS_USED AS isUsed, C.modify_date AS modifyDate, CASE WHEN C.EXPIRE_DATE >= sysdate THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS expire FROM MALL.MALL_TB_POINTS_CARD C, (SELECT t.USER_ID, t.USER_NAME FROM MALL.MALL_TB_USER t WHERE t.STATE = 'U' ) U WHERE C.USER_ID = U.USER_ID(+) AND C.STATE = 'U' AND C.SHOP_ID = #shopId#
u.user_name like #userName,handler=wildcard#
c.CARD_NO like #cardNo,handler=wildcard#
c.IS_USED = #isUsed#

SELECT t.id, t.points FROM MALL.MALL_TB_POINTS_CARD t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.is_used = 'N' AND t.expire_date >= sysdate AND t.shop_id = #shopId# AND t.card_no = #cardNo# AND t.password = #password#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MALL.MALL_TB_POINTS_CARD t SET t.modify_date = sysdate, t.modify_user = #modifyUser#, t.user_id = #userId#, t.is_used = 'Y' WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.is_used = 'N' AND t.shop_id = #shopId# AND t.card_no = #cardNo# AND t.password = #password#
